name: Ajay Yadav
bio: ERP Linker is a boutique integration consultancy specializing in end‑to‑end ERP, e‑commerce, and workflow automation, helping B2B organizations eliminate manual processes and scale with confidence. With deep expertise across NetSuite, Global Shop Solutions, MRPERP, and custom ERPs, ERP Linker connects storefronts like Shopify, BigCommerce, and WooCommerce with finance, fulfillment, and approvals to create a single source of operational truth.
